src_original: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ grāmagatam araṇyagatam vā adattam pareṣāṃ steyasaṃkhyātam ādadīta
tgt_original: 「若比丘！ 若在村落，若閑靜處，不與，盜心取。

src_original: yadrūpeṇādattādānena rājā vainaṃ gṛhītvā rājamātro vā hanyād vā badhnīyād vā pravāsayed  vā evaṃ cainaṃ vaded dhambho puruṣa cauro 'si bālo 'si mūḍho 'si steyo 'sīty (Upj(J)  23.1-5; ~ Skt.C 50 v5-7; vgl. Kṣudr-v(Bhī) 25 a2-4)
tgt_original: 隨不與取法，若為王王大臣所捉，若殺、若縛、若驅出國： 『汝是賊！ 汝癡！ 汝無所知。

src_original: evaṃrūpaṃ bhikṣuḥ sthānam adhyāpadya sahādhyāpattyā abhikṣur bhavati yāvat tadyathā tālo mastakāc chinnaḥ yāvan nādhyāpatsye (Upj(J)
chastraṃ vainam ādhārayec chastrādhārakaṃ vāsya paryeṣeta maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpayen
tgt_original: 故自手斷人命，持刀授與人，歎譽死、快勸死： 『咄！

src_original: maraṇāvarṇaṃ vāsyānusaṃvarṇayet* evaṃ cainaṃ vaded dhambho puruṣa kiṃ te 'nena pāpakenāśucinā
durjīvitena mṛtaṃ te bhoḥ puruṣa jīvitād varam iti cittānumataiś cittasaṃkalpair
anekaparyāyeṇa maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpayen maraṇāvarṇaṃ vāsyānusaṃvarṇayet* /
tgt_original: 』作如是心思惟，種種方便，歎譽死、快勸死。
